snippet: The Russian opposition figure Aleksei A. Navalny was released Friday after spending 15 days in custody and vowed that he and his supporters would not be intimidated by the killing of Boris Y. Nemtsov.
abstract: Russian opposition figure Aleksei A Navalny is released after spending 15 days in prison for distributing leaflets in subway; vows that recent killing of Boris Y Nemtsov will not deter opposition movement.
lead_paragraph: The Russian opposition figure Aleksei A. Navalny was released Friday after spending 15 days in custody and vowed that he and his supporters would not be intimidated by the killing of Boris Y. Nemtsov.

headline.main: Russia: Navalny Is Released From Jail
headline.print_headline: Russia: Navalny Is Released From Jail
